title: Cactopus please
body:
You're a Legend and basically a god of Memes..

PLEASE BECOME THE M&G OFFICIAL RIOTER REPRESENTATIVE

I'll kidnap and stab anyone who's stopping you from doing this

{{champion:35}} 

*we need you*

replies.body:
I voted for '...the fuck is wrong with you?', because that was basically my first thought after reading this.

It isn't a no, though
Now now, be nice, you are canadian
COME ON HUMANS, WE NEED MORE UPVOTES TO ATTRACT A WILD ROITER
where is the option of, Killing? sign me the hell up!

*writes name on random board in space*

Signed up, THE ROITER SHALL BE OURS... We just need more Upvotes to be noticed
